Title: Inception
Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology.

Description: A rich girl and a poor artist fall in love aboard the Titanic.

Title: Interstellar
Description: Explorers travel through a wormhole to save humanity.

Description: Batman faces Joker, a criminal mastermind in Gotham.

Description: An Alabama man witnesses key historical events.

Description: A hacker discovers the truth about reality and AI.

Title: The Godfather
Description: A mafia boss transfers power to his reluctant son.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Description: The lives of two hitmen intertwine with others.

Title: Fight Club
Description: An office worker forms an underground fight club.

Description: Heroes unite to undo the damage of Thanos.

Description: A poor family schemes to work for a rich one.

Description: Facebook's creation and legal battles.

Title: Joker
Description: A failed comedian becomes a criminal mastermind.

Title: Gladiator

Description: An actress and a jazz musician fall in love.

Description: The journey of a lion cub to become king.

Description: A girl enters the world of spirits to save her parents.

Description: A boy journeys to the Land of the Dead.

Title: Avatar
Description: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

Description: A witty blacksmith and a quirky pirate team up to rescue a kidnapped woman from undead pirates cursed by stolen treasure.

Description: Peter Parker gains spider-like powers and must balance high school life with fighting crime.

Description: As Peter struggles with his powers ,a new villain, Doctor Octopus, threatens the city.

Description: Peter faces his darkest side and multiple foes, including Sandman and Venom.

Description: The Avengers must stop an AI villain they accidentally created from destroying humanity.

Description: Batman sees Superman as a threat, leading to a battle that unleashes a greater enemy.

Description: As Voldemort rises, Harry uncovers secrets from a mysterious potion book.

Title: The Lone Ranger
Description: A masked ranger and his Native American ally fight corruption in the Old West.

Title: Man of Steel
Description: Superman discovers his alien heritage and must protect Earth from a deadly Kryptonian threat.

Description: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia to help Prince Caspian reclaim his throne.

Title: The Avengers
Description: Earth’s mightiest heroes unite to stop Loki and an alien invasion.

Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
Description: Jack Sparrow searches for the Fountain of Youth while clashing with Blackbeard.

Title: Men in Black
Description: A secret agency monitors extraterrestrial life while keeping Earth’s humans blissfully unaware.

Description: Robin becomes an outlaw hero as he fights injustice and defends the oppressed.

Description: Bilbo and the dwarves face deadly creatures on their quest to defeat the dragon Smaug.

Title: The Golden Compass
Description: A brave girl journeys through a parallel world to uncover a sinister conspiracy.

Title: King Kong
